description: The trail at the Balmoral Grist Mill provincial park is short but it follows the river under a nice mature hemlock forest.  A bonus is the Grist Mill museum and two waterfalls.  One of the fall is at the mill itself while the other one is on the upstream end of the trail.
directions: Highway 256 (Balmoral Rd) to the Balmoral Provincial Park.
title: Balmoral Grist Mill
